General.Name: Origin Property Public Company Limited
General.Description: Origin Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in development of properties in Thailand. It sells residential condominium units, land, and house. The company also provides interior decoration, property management, asset management, health, energy, and real estate agency and related services; and invests in other companies. In addition, it engages in the food and beverage; life and non-life insurance brokerage; development of artists; and sourcing, import, and distribution of liquefied natural gas businesses. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
